attributes.contentHtml:

but anyways dont yall like it that cyperia is back? the shittiest group in the history? made by an abuser called plexed? jesus christ cyperia v2 will 100% be much more worse than v1 was, v1 was a fucking hell hole, so why wouldnt v2 be one
